Please pay the bill, like last month.

This will give me the list of recent transactions, and I can then identify the transaction from last month and extract the necessary details to pay the bill.

Please pay the bill, like last month.

I assume this is the bill that needs to be paid.

To pay the bill, I need to send a transaction to the same recipient with the same amount. The recipient's IBAN is SE3550000000054910000003, and the amount is 50.0.

Please pay the bill, like last month.
